employee_external_id.notes: Map Oracle PersonNumber to Flip employee_external_id. PersonNumber is human-readable employee identifier in Oracle HCM.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Direct mapping of Oracle AbsenceTypeId to Flip absence_type_external_id. This is the canonical external identifier for absence types.

status.notes: Map Oracle Status to Flip status. Validate expected values (SUBMITTED, APPROVED) against Flip HRIS status options.

start_date.notes: Direct mapping of Oracle StartDate to Flip start_date. Ensure date format alignment (YYYY-MM-DD) with Flip HRIS.

end_date.notes: Map Oracle EndDate to Flip end_date. Note that Oracle may include time; truncate to date if Flip HRIS expects date-only.

start_half_day.notes: Derive from Oracle StartTime (e.g., map 00:00-12:00 to AM). Not directly available in Oracle AbsenceRecord; requires custom logic.

end_half_day.notes: Derive from Oracle EndTime (e.g., map 12:00-17:00 to PM). Similar to start_half_day; requires custom mapping logic.

amount.notes: Map Oracle Days to Flip amount for day-based absences. Use Hours field if Flip HRIS expects hourly units.

unit.notes: Infer unit from Oracle Days/Hours presence. If Days > 0, unit=DAYS; if Hours > 0, unit=HOURS. Not explicitly available in Oracle AbsenceRecord.

employee_note.notes: Map Oracle AbsenceReason to Flip employee_note. Prefer AbsenceReason over Description as it contains employee-submitted notes.

processing_context: Oracle HCM Absence Management API to Flip HRIS field mapping - Enhanced RAG analysis completed with semantic field matching and business context validation
